meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of an ironworks.
meanings.sent1: The skilled ironmasters oversaw the production of iron in the factory.
meanings.sent2: The ironmasters made sure the ironworks ran smoothly and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The ironmasters joked that they were the 'kings of iron' in the town.
meanings.sent4: The ironmasters were the captains of the iron ship, steering it through the challenges of production.
meanings.sent5: The ironmasters were like the conductors of a symphony, orchestrating the creation of iron products.

meanings.definition: The group of people who own or manage an ironworks.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated team of ironmasters worked together to improve the ironworks.
meanings.sent2: The ironmasters held meetings to discuss the future plans for the ironworks.
meanings.sent3: The ironmasters celebrated their success with a barbecue at the ironworks.
meanings.sent4: The ironmasters were the guardians of the ironworks, protecting it from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The ironmasters were like a family, united in their goal to make the ironworks prosper.
